name: John Eichman, Receiver of the North Schuylkill Mutual Fire Insurance Company v. John Hersker, Appellant

judges: Before Gkeen, Williams, McCollum, Dean and Fell, JJ.
parties: John Eichman, Receiver of the North Schuylkill Mutual Fire Insurance Company v. John Hersker, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Dean,
This case is in no essential particular different from No. 801, January term, 1895, in which opinion is filed herewith; therefore the same decree, “ Judgment affirmed, and appeal dismissed at costs of appellant,” is herewith entered.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Dean,

casebody.head_matter:
John Eichman, Receiver of the North Schuylkill Mutual Fire Insurance Company v. John Hersker, Appellant.
Argued Feb. 21, 1895.
Appeal, No. 302, Jan. T., 1895, by defendant, from judgment of C. P. Schuylkill Co., May. T., 1886, No. 13, on verdict for plaintiff.
Before Gkeen, Williams, McCollum, Dean and Fell, JJ.
Affirmed.
Assumpsit to recover assessment on policy No. 525. Before Pershing, P. J.
See next preceding case.
October 7, 1895:
